pullRequest.title: add threshold for organizing imports with the asterisk (*) wildcard character
pullRequest.bodyText:
See redhat-developer/vscode-java#964
see redhat-developer/vscode-java#1374
Signed-off-by: Snjezana Peco snjezana.peco@redhat.com

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -263,6 +264,30 @@ */ public static final String MEMBER_SORT_ORDER = "java.memberSortOrder"; //$NON-NLS-1$ + /** + * A named preference that specifies the number of imports added before a + * star-import declaration is used. + *

+ * Value is of type Integer: positive value specifying the number + * of non star-import is used + *

+ */ + public static final String IMPORTS_ONDEMANDTHRESHOLD = "java.import.ondemandthreshold"; //$NON-NLS-1$

@@ -263,6 +264,30 @@ */ public static final String MEMBER_SORT_ORDER = "java.memberSortOrder"; //$NON-NLS-1$ + /** + * A named preference that specifies the number of imports added before a + * star-import declaration is used. + *

+ * Value is of type Integer: positive value specifying the number + * of non star-import is used + *

+ */ + public static final String IMPORTS_ONDEMANDTHRESHOLD = "java.import.ondemandthreshold"; //$NON-NLS-1$ + + /** + * A named preference that specifies the number of static imports added before a + * star-import declaration is used. + *

+ * Value is of type Integer: positive value specifying the number + * of non star-import is used + *

+ */ + public static final String IMPORTS_STATIC_ONDEMANDTHRESHOLD = "java.import.staticondemandthreshold"; //$NON-NLS-1$
